doc:
Paul Powell (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Powell_(director) 0 Paul Mahlon Powell (September 6, 1881 – July 2, 1944) was an American journalist, director, producer, screenwriter, and actor. Powell was most active during the silent film era and is best known for directing Mary Pickford in Pollyanna (1920). Paul_Mahlon_Powell ( September_6_,_1881 – July_2_,_1944 ) was an_American_journalist , director , producer , screenwriter , and actor . Powell was most_active during the_silent_film_era and is_best_known for directing Mary_Pickford in Pollyanna_(_1920_) .
